src:
Afridza Munandar Dianggap Layak Dapat Status Pahlawan Olahraga
05 Nov 2019, 12:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kepala Dinas Pemuda dan Olahraga (Dispora) Provinsi Jabar, Engkus Sutisna, menyatakan mendiang pebalap muda Indonesia, Afridza Munandar, layak mendapatkan penghormatan sebagai pahlawan olahraga.
Afridza, meninggal dunia usai terjatuh dalam balapan pertama Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup di Sepang, Malaysia, pada Sabtu (2/11/2019). Usai mendapatkan perawatan medis dari petugas trek, ia ditransfer ke Rumah Sakit Kuala Lumpur dengan helikopter. Sayangnya, nyawa Afridza tak tertolong.
"Afridza Munandar adalah pahlawan olahraga Jawa Barat," kata Engkus saat melayat di rumah duka Perumahan Tamansari Indah, Kelurahan Karsamenak, Kecamatan Kawalu, Kota Tasikmalaya, Senin malam (4/11/2019).
text:
Afridza Munandar Is Considered Eligible For Sports Hero Status
05 Nov 2019, 12:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - West Java's Youth and Sports Agency (Dispora) Head, Engkus Sutisna, said the late young Indonesian rider, Afridza Munandar, deserves respect as a sports hero.
Afridza, died after falling in the first race of the Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup in Sepang, Malaysia, on Saturday (11/02/2019). After getting medical treatment from the track officer, he was transferred to Kuala Lumpur Hospital by helicopter. Unfortunately, Afridza's life was beyond help.
"Afridza Munandar is a sports hero in West Java," Engkus said while mourning at the funeral home Tamansari Indah Housing, Karsamenak Village, Kawalu District, Tasikmalaya City, Monday night (4/11/2019).
